charinfo.name: Cursed Seal Sasuke
charinfo.description: Having gotten used to the Cursed Seal, Sasuke is able to draw Orochimaru's vile chakra through it, becoming a twisted hideous version of himself, but also getting stronger and faster. With the Cursed Seal, Sasuke's powers have exponentially increased, allowing him to pierce or trap enemies with his dark chakra.

abilities.name: Corrupt Chidori
abilities.description: Mixing a chidori with his corrupt chakra, Sasuke deals 45 piercing damage to one enemy and for 2 turns, will reduce their non-affliction damage by 20.

abilities.name: Dark Void
abilities.description: Expunging the corrupt chakra, Sasuke engulfs one enemy, stunning them for 2 turns, and making them invulnerable to all skills. When this skill ends, that enemy will receive 55 damage. This skill will end if Sasuke dies.

abilities.name: Cursed Seal
abilities.description: Sasuke taps into the power of Orochimaru's cursed seal, becoming invulnerable to all skills for 1 turn and taking 20 affliction damage. The following turn 'Corrupt Chidori' will cost 1 random chakra and 'Dark Void' will cost 2 random chakra.

abilities.name: Sharingan Evasion
abilities.description: This skill makes Cursed Seal Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.
